name: pnp-list-formatting-payments-format
title: Payment Registration format
shortDescription: This sample provides a payment list format to register daily expenses, currency, status, rate option, Locations, copy file link, comments and categorization of payment.
longDescription: This sample provides a payment list format to register daily expenses, currency, status, rate option, Locations, copy file link, comments and categorization of payment.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
